channel.title: haskell on Amish Kumar Naidu
channel.description: Recent content in haskell on Amish Kumar Naidu

item.title: life.hs
item.description: A dead-simple simulator for Conway’s Game of Life in Haskell. Source: GitHub Compiling: $ ghc --make life.hs Usage: ./life < seeds/PulsarSeed.txt Or $ runhaskell life.hs < seeds/GliderSeed.txt Seeds are space separeted matrices of 0 and 1 representing dead/alive cell. Note that it uses ANSI escape sequences so this may not work on Windows.
